SEARCH

Class Rect

java.lang.Object
Rect
public class Rect extends Object
A rectangle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Rect()
    Create a new rectangle at default position with default color.
    Rect(int x, int y, int width, int height, String color, boolean visible)
    Create a new rectangle at a specified position and color.

    • Rect

      public Rect()
      Create a new rectangle at default position with default color.

    • Rect

      public Rect(int x, int y, int width, int height, String color, boolean visible)
      Create a new rectangle at a specified position and color.

  • Method Details

    • makeVisible

      public void makeVisible()
      Make this rectangle visible. If it was already visible, do nothing.

    • makeInvisible

      public void makeInvisible()
      Make this rectangle invisible. If it was already invisible, do nothing.

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Determine if the rectangle should be showing on the canvas
      Returns:
      true if the shape is not hidden

      Get the rectangle's X position

      Determine the rectangle's current height

      Change the rectangle's width

      Change the rectangle's height

      public void moveRight()
      Move the rectangle a few pixels to the right.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      Move the rectangle a few pixels to the left.

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Move the rectangle a few pixels up.

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Move the rectangle a few pixels down.

    • moveHorizontal

      public void moveHorizontal(int distance)
      Move the rectangle horizontally by 'distance' pixels.
      Parameters:
      distance - the distance to move the rectangle along the x axis, positive to the right

    • moveVertical

      public void moveVertical(int distance)
      Move the rectangle vertically by 'distance' pixels.
      Parameters:
      distance - the distance to move the rectangle along the y axis, positive down

    • changeSize

      public void changeSize(int newSize)
      Change the size to the new size (in pixels). Size must be >= 0.
      Parameters:
      newSize - the new width and height of the square

    • changeSize

      public void changeSize(int newHeight, int newWidth)
      Change the size of the rectangle to a new, non-square size. newHeight and newWidth must be >= 0.
      Parameters:
      newHeight - the new length of the rectangle along the y axis
      newWidth - the new width of the rectangle along the x axis

    • changeColor

      public void changeColor(String newColor)
      Change the color. Valid colors are "red", "yellow", "blue", "green", "magenta", "cyan", "brown", "white", and "black", or rgb hex strings "#rrggbb" where rr, gg, bb are 2-hexit values for red, green, and blue levels.
      Parameters:
      newColor - a string naming the new color for the rectangle

    • contains

      public boolean contains(int x, int y)
      Determine if a point is inside the rectangle
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the point
      y - the y-coordinate of the point
      Returns:
      true if the point is inside the rectangle
